level.heading: Commission bylaws to be filed with Mayor.
level.text: Pursuant to Article III(i) of the Compact, the Commission shall file a copy of the Commission's bylaws and amendments to the bylaws with the Mayor of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-65, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 38-2301.
